argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pmtrrn.t | |- T = ( pmTrsp ` D ) |
| 2 |  | pmtrrn.r | |- R = ran T |
| 3 |  | pmtrfrn.p | |- P = dom ( F \ _I ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_pmtrfrn | |- ( F e. R -> ( ( D e. _V /\ P C_ D /\ P ~~ 2o ) /\ F = ( T ` P ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simprd | |- ( F e. R -> F = ( T ` P ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( F e. R -> ( F ` Z ) = ( ( T ` P ) ` Z ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( F e. R /\ Z e. D ) -> ( F ` Z ) = ( ( T ` P ) ` Z ) ) |
| 8 | 4 | #P_simpld | |- ( F e. R -> ( D e. _V /\ P C_ D /\ P ~~ 2o ) ) |
| 9 | 1 | #P_pmtrfv | |- ( ( ( D e. _V /\ P C_ D /\ P ~~ 2o ) /\ Z e. D ) -> ( ( T ` P ) ` Z ) = if ( Z e. P , U. ( P \ { Z } ) , Z ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( F e. R /\ Z e. D ) -> ( ( T ` P ) ` Z ) = if ( Z e. P , U. ( P \ { Z } ) , Z ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( F e. R /\ Z e. D ) -> ( F ` Z ) = if ( Z e. P , U. ( P \ { Z } ) , Z ) ) |
